collection.description: A curated collection of interesting links and Tweets related to Serverless, Code and Cloud.

1126317663137910784.name: Andrew Hills
1126317663137910784.full_text: When your API isn't finished and you want to continue developing the frontend use moc data. Store the testdata in the /Public/testdata/moc.json, then call it in the function. Have a better way, comments, please? #reactjs #Serverless https://t.co/Iv9NE4CuVu

1023760052656590848.name: Andrew Hills
1023760052656590848.full_text: Two Hours to hack US voting machines? Scary! Need another reason to take security seriously. https://t.co/OVgGg0EqxA #CloudComputing #WordPress #CloudNews #reactjs #serverless

media.headline: Hackers break into voting machines within 2 hours at Defcon
media.lead: Hackers from around the world cracked into voting machines at Defcon convention in Las Vegas this weekend
